website_summaries.verdict: Combines modern electric operation with throw-back, hand-cranked candy crusher for ice cream making fun.
pros: Garners enthusiasm for the built-in candy crusher that adds a bit of nostalgia with its hand-crank operation
Makes ice cream and other frozen treats in as little as 25 minutes
cons: Issues with the motor failing after several uses have been reported

customer_reviews.title: Cute and works well
customer_reviews.text: We wanted one that uses ice and didn't require freezing the bucket all the time. We also wanted one sized better to our needs (which a 4QT is overkill and bulky to store). This smaller unit doesn't take up much more space than a spaghetti-pot. If there were to be an improvement, it would be with the recipes. When you get a crockpot or other small appliances, you generally get a fair number of recipes designed for the machine. I was able to google quite a few though so expect to need that.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: As Expected
customer_reviews.text: I've never owned an ice cream maker, let alone made ice cream, and this machine does what it says. I follow the directions exactly, and I've made frozen yogurt, ice cream, and sorbet. I haven't followed recipes in the manual, but rather looked some up online. You do get what you paid for. I'm sure there are better quality machines on the market, but this works for the price. The plastic isn't dishwasher safe, and I'm sure it won't hold up forever. The paddle touches the sides but I still scrape the sides down to help reduce stress on the paddle and gears.
customer_reviews.author: Fox C-Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Do exactly what the manual say...and you will happy with it
customer_reviews.text: There is no dislike the product does what it says it made creamy icecream I bought for my grandson and I we love it ...its awesome
customer_reviews.author: davi

customer_reviews.title: Does not make ice cream.
customer_reviews.text: This product is terrible. It does not freeze the ice cream in 15-30 minutes, even if you freeze the container beforehand. The churning part does not scrape the sides properly to help in actually making the ice cream. Yes I also added salt ice...I make ice cream weekly for people and I thought this would be helpful to make additional quarts all at once. I unfortunately didn’t save the box so this will be going straight in the trash. Waste of money. Homemade ice cream should be if at least soft serve consistency not milkshake.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: Makes awesome ice cream.. Its easy to use.. But you do have to plan ahead a little as the container needs to be frozen
customer_reviews.author: Jack Williams

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this Icecream maker. Easy to use and the children love it. So happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian queen

customer_reviews.title: This is a great icecream maker.
customer_reviews.text: This two quart icecream maker works great. I used it. As instructed. With icecream salt and ice. I ordered icecream salt on Amizon. I also ordered the icecream mix. On Amizon. It came out. Just like the hand cranked. Icecream makers. The electric motor is really powerful. Two quarts is plenty for four people. I bought this for my wife and I. The four quarts and six quarts. Are too big for us. And this one. Works better. And you can't bet the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Made birthday cake ice cream and it was AMAZING! Great product! It didn’t come with the candy crusher handle which was a little disappointing, but overall it is a FANTASTIC product!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Wright

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I gave 4 instead of 5 because I still get a little icey texture even after using tips from their website I think it’s because of their brand of ice cream mix possibly or just my fault lol but it’s a great mixer at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Took it out of the box. Read the instructions. Packed it up. Returned It. Too much trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Really love this! My husband and son can't have dairy but they love ice cream! So why not make it myself?! Well this thing did so well at making my husbands favorite Cherry Garcia but dairy free!!! And with the candy crusher it made it easy to get the little chocolate chunks mixed in really well!!! We will be making so much more!
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Function
customer_reviews.text: It works just as it said. It takes 30 minutes for the ice cream to make. To add candies the crusher works but in small portions. I made two types of ice cream, they were both a huge hit
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: yummy ice cream
customer_reviews.text: If adding frozen fruit, make sure it is pre-cut into small pieces. It freezes ice cream pretty fast... i was surprised. 30-40 minutes. I keep layering ice and rock salt while its turning.
customer_reviews.author: LMF

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. It just looks really cut but I tried fir two days and it didn’t work . Need a ton of salt and ice but too much work .. never gets very cold
customer_reviews.author: Christie Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Electrical issue
customer_reviews.text: It actually didn’t work when we got it all set up, my husband took it apart and then reconnected some wires and then it worked. The ice cream is good.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Need to freeze ice cream before you can eat it
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work as well as expected. I've cream is too soupy
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Simple Fun
customer_reviews.text: During this pandemic, kids get antsy with only so much I can do since I am working from home. It was a fun purchase, kids love it and they can come up with some good flavors. Easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.author: andi herrmann

customer_reviews.title: Unit will not work.
customer_reviews.text: Unit will not turn on. Operate at all. This is ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Did not turn on
customer_reviews.text: Would not turn on so we never got to use it. I made sure that it was assembled correctly and that the power outlet was working, but nothing. Returned and ordered a different One from Lowe’s
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn T.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't crush candy the way it claims to. I bought it for the candy crusher so I was disappointed. Icecream maker works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but didn’t work for me.
customer_reviews.text: Must be a dud. Set everything up as directed. Plugged in and no power. Tried another outlet, still no power. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: JoyfulGA

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This ice cream maker is awesome. It makes just enough, it’s super easy to use and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Homemade Ice Cream in less than 30!!!
customer_reviews.text: So fast!! Makes Ice Cream in less than 30 minutes, I have only tried the ice cream packets made by the company but they're yummy!! Planning on making some from scratch very soon!!!
customer_reviews.author: Diana Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Makes great vegan ice cream. Company also easy to deal with when a small plastic piece broke, replacing the entire part.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed with this machine. Worked great first time I used it. Second time it just stopped midway through freezing. Too late to return so I’m writing a review. Basically $40.00 wasted.
customer_reviews.author: Shaunte

customer_reviews.title: Makes delicious ice cream.
customer_reviews.text: We'vw made everything from green tea, fresh fruit and mint chip ice cream and the results are always the same; delicious homemade ice cream. We are really happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: mary dickey

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Just got this thing today was so excited to make ice cream.... it’s been over an hour and all I have is cold milk!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sasha

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift and it didn't turn first time using.
customer_reviews.author: Leanna Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: bad
customer_reviews.text: dont buy it is a waste of money and complicated to use
customer_reviews.author: piyawadee willis

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My son-in-law was delighted with this gift. He could not wait to get home to put it to use. Great service too.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my teenagers to use due to being home since March from this virus thing going around. They have made a little bit of everything. They are even trying online receipts to make similar things to blizzards and flurries. They love the option to add treats in to them too and takes half the time of a normal maker too.
customer_reviews.author: Kelcee29

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and makes great icecream every time
customer_reviews.text: We’ve made several batches of icecream in our machine now and they were perfect every time. It was so easy and kids love watching it. Love the machine.
customer_reviews.author: Chris and Trish

customer_reviews.title: Fresh ice cream for Mothers day
customer_reviews.text: Love this item. Made 2 quarts of chocolate ice cream with crushed nuts and brownies in under 22 minutes- simple and easy. Everyone was amazed with this product and enjoyed the ice cream tremendously I may buy one for my sister too! (if she is nice to me)
customer_reviews.author: ling ling chee

customer_reviews.title: Nostalgic but didn't Rotate
customer_reviews.text: The ice cream maker was nostalgic and the color was nice. However it never rotated on the first use. Wasted all my ingredients trying to get the canister to rotate.
customer_reviews.author: vienna pearson

customer_reviews.title: Hand made ice cream is th best
customer_reviews.text: Wish it had a crank like when we were kids. Sooper ez, ton o fun
customer_reviews.author: Rich W.

customer_reviews.title: Great bargain
customer_reviews.text: Easy to operate however the canister does leak a bit
customer_reviews.author: Lindy

customer_reviews.title: Cute on the outside
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandkids to make homemade ice cream with I was a little disappointed the machine kept freezing up but it’s very cute love the color
customer_reviews.author: Janell

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and stylish
customer_reviews.text: My family loves it. Homemade ice cream in 20 minutes. Easy clean up
customer_reviews.author: Monica smith

customer_reviews.title: Great ice cream maker
customer_reviews.text: I loved that you can crush candy with it also to put in your ice cream. It also works really well me and my husband have made a ton of ice cream in it. And I love it also comes with a recipe book so all you have to do is follow the directions. The recipes are all so good.
customer_reviews.author: Leonna

customer_reviews.title: You can control what you use for your ingredients
customer_reviews.text: My girls are allergic to milk but that doesn't mean they can't enjoy it cream with this machine you can control what you use for your ingredients
customer_reviews.author: candice.....

customer_reviews.title: Great Counter Top Ice Cream Maker
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my daughter as a birthday gift. It is very easy to use. Mess free and the ice cream has always turned out excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Odom

product_meta.title: Nostalgia Aqua Blue Electric Ice Cream Maker with Candy Crusher, 2 quart
product_meta.description: Color:AquaIntroducing the fast and easy way to make quarts of ice cream, frozen yogurt, or sorbet! Easily add ice and rock salt through the top of the ice cream bucket, then take the removable bucket off the base to keep ice cream cold when ready to serve. Best of all, use the unique hand crank candy Crusher to break up your favorite candy and cookie pieces to customize your ice cream creation. Perfect for adding ingredients like cookie dough, nuts, candy pieces, and more!
feature_bullets: Capacity - makes up to 2 quarts of ice cream, frozen yogurt or sorbet at a time
Canister & dasher - mixing dasher and 2-quart aluminum Canister together to make smooth, creamy ice cream
Durable motor - durable bottom-drive electric motor does all the churning - no manual effort
Detachable bucket - detachable ice cream bucket keeps ice cream cold when ready to serve
Ice & salt - top opening makes it easy to add ice and salt
Candy crusher - hand crank candy crusher breaks up your favorite mix-ins and candy pieces to customize ice cream
On/off - distinctive turn dial on/off Medallion
Easy-to-clean - plastic interior​ makes cleanup quick and simple
Cord storage - stows away neatly for tidy storage

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars149 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
